fields.description:
The test NetScripts fails with weme6.1. Last successful run: May 31 ( revision 780357), first failure: June 2 (revision 781237), see for instance: http://people.apache.org/~myrnavl/derby_test_results/main/windows/testSummary-781237.html:

1) NetScripts:clientjava.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: javax.naming.Referenceable
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassImpl(Native Method)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.access$0(ClassLoader.java:304)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader$1.run(ClassLoader.java:230)
	at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(AccessController.java:213)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:228)
	at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:109)
	at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClassImpl(URLClassLoader.java:1029)
	at java.net.URLClassLoader$4.run(URLClassLoader.java:549)
	at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(AccessController.java:213)
	at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:547)
	at com.ibm.oti.vm.URLSystemClassLoader.findClass(URLSystemClassLoader.java:27)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:601)
	at com.ibm.oti.vm.URLSystemClassLoader.loadClass(URLSystemClassLoader.java:60)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:563)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassImpl(Native Method)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.access$0(ClassLoader.java:304)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader$1.run(ClassLoader.java:230)
	at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(AccessController.java:213)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:228)
	at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:109)
	at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClassImpl(URLClassLoader.java:1029)
	at java.net.URLClassLoader$4.run(URLClassLoader.java:549)
	at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(AccessController.java:213)
	at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:547)
	at com.ibm.oti.vm.URLSystemClassLoader.findClass(URLSystemClassLoader.java:27)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:601)
	at com.ibm.oti.vm.URLSystemClassLoader.loadClass(URLSystemClassLoader.java:60)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:563)
	at java.lang.Class.forNameImpl(Native Method)
	at java.lang.Class.forName(Class.java:147)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.JDBCDataSource.getDataSourceObject(JDBCDataSource.java:156)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.JDBCDataSource.getDataSource(JDBCDataSource.java:106)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.JDBCDataSource.getDataSource(JDBCDataSource.java:91)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.DataSourceConnector.setConfiguration(DataSourceConnector.java:49)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.TestConfiguration.initConnector(TestConfiguration.java:1209)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.TestConfiguration.<init>(TestConfiguration.java:984)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.ServerSetup.getNewConfiguration(ServerSetup.java:45)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.ChangeConfigurationSetup.setUp(ChangeConfigurationSetup.java:37)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:18)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)
	at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:22)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:19)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)

As this is a network test, it's probably ok if it doesn't run at all with weme6.1/JSR169.
fields.summary: test NetScripts fails with IBM's weme6.1
